insights.consumer_insight: Explosive demand for pantyliners indicates a shift in daily feminine hygiene habits. Customers are seeking everyday freshness products beyond period days.
actions: Urgently address fillrate issues causing 62% availability—coordinate with Whisper, Plush, and Stayfree suppliers
Expand assortment with daily liner variants (scented, organic cotton, biodegradable)
Create 'daily freshness' collection featuring pantyliners prominently

insights.consumer_insight: Customers are searching for portable paper soap sheets at unprecedented rates, signaling demand for travel-friendly, hygienic handwash alternatives.
actions: Expand soap paper SKU assortment immediately—currently limited selection
Address fillrate issues with vendors (current 62% availability)
Feature in 'travel essentials' and 'on-the-go hygiene' collections

insights.consumer_insight: Seasonal cold/flu symptoms driving massive search spike for throat lozenges. Vicks brand commands strong trust for symptomatic relief.
actions: Stock up on Vicks lozenges variants (menthol, honey-lemon) before winter peak ends
Resolve fillrate issues—61% availability is losing significant sales
Cross-promote with other cold remedies (Vicks VapoRub, steam inhalers)

insights.consumer_insight: Category search has doubled to 32K weekly searches, indicating growing comfort with the category and customers exploring beyond just condoms.
actions: Expand assortment beyond condoms—add intimate wellness kits, lubricants, and enhancers
Address Planning/Ordering issues causing 79% availability to hit 90%+ target
Consider discrete packaging messaging in product descriptions

insights.consumer_insight: Anomalous spike suggests customers seeking misting/setting spray tools for makeup application, or possibly DIY beauty tool interest.
actions: Clarify if demand is for makeup setting spray bottles vs empty spray bottles
Urgently address 57% availability—worst in this batch
Bundle with setting sprays or skincare mists if bottles are the container type

insights.consumer_insight: Alife soap (Adani Wilmar brand) showing strong traction with value packs across variants like Lime, Sandal, Rose.
actions: Ensure full variant coverage—Lime, Sandal, Rose, Gondhoraj, Neem, Lily sets all available
Resolve PO planning issues causing 73% availability
Feature in 'value packs' and 'family essentials' collections

actions: Prioritize Whisper period panty stock—coordinate with P&G on fill rates
Ensure size coverage (M-L, L-XL) and pack variants (single, value packs of 18)
Cross-merchandise with sanitary pads for 'complete period care' positioning

actions: Stock Close Up variants (Everfresh, Deep Action) at adequate depth
